nodes.text: This moon was one of several that orbited the Mid Rim astronomical object Kalarba. The Imperial space station Hosk Station was constructed entirely around the moon.

The moon hosting Hosk Station was first mentioned in The Official Star Wars Fact File Part 79. In Legends, the moon was called Hosk and first appeared in the novel The New Jedi Order: Agents of Chaos II: Jedi Eclipse.
